thread.title: Preds encouraged by play despite season's first loss

title: Preds encouraged by play despite season's first loss
text: Preds encouraged by play despite season's first loss OCT 15, 10:05 pm Predators winger James Neal was encouraged by his team's play in a 4-3 loss to the Islanders on Wednesday.
